item.title: Bureau of International Missions
item.description: This bureau is part of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs The Bureau of International Missions is the formal foreign policymaking apparatus of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Prepare bulletins from Parliamentary and Secretarial notes on foreign affairs Formulate cohesive positions on events of domestic concern Outline a consistent Commonwealth foreign policy to determine and advise decision-making in future.
item.content:encoded:
This bureau is part of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs

The Bureau of International Missions is the formal foreign policymaking apparatus of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

  • Prepare bulletins from Parliamentary and Secretarial notes on foreign affairs
  • Formulate cohesive positions on events of domestic concern
  • Outline a consistent Commonwealth foreign policy to determine and advise decision-making in future.
